title: A Debt Repaid: Love and intrigue in Europe
description: When Jennifer and Sarah first meet Robert Ballantyne in London he is generous, but they soon find him to be evil and unscrupulous. Is it guilt about his father or his own illegal goings-on that causes him to drink? In Berlin after Jennifer's untimely death, Sarah learns the shocking answers. While doing so she also finds the love of her life. An intriguing multi-layered mystery set in London, Paris and Berlin. “A Debt Repaid “ is full of suspense, spirituality, and romance.
author: Jean Prugh
